basic.Peptide Name: Defensin-like protein 2 (Cp-thionin II; Cp-thionin-2; Gamma-thionin II; Plant defensin)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATTC 25923 (MIC=128 mg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATTC 25922 (MIC=64 mg/ml), Pseudomonas syringae (MIC=42 mg/ml).
